page.title: 17TOURISM:FLEET
page.content: THERE ARE MANY VISITORS TO{FLEET EACH YEAR.THEY COME FOR MANY DIFFERENT REASONS.IT IS A VERY POPULAR PLACE FOR {FISHING}AND LOTS OF{COMPETITIONS}ARE HELD ON{CHESIL BEACH.}THERE ARE LOTS OF PLACES FOR PEOPLE TO WALK. THEY CAN HAVE A CHOICE OF WALKING IN THE FIELDS OR WALKING ON THE BEACH. IF THEY LIKE {BIRD WATCHING}THEY CAN SEE MANY SORTS OF{BIRDS.}MANY PEOPLE VISIT THIS AREA BECAUSE OF A STORY BY{J. MEADE FALKNER ENTITLED{MOONFLEET}. THEY LIKE TO PICTURE THE SMUGGLERS BRINING THEIR STOLEN GOODS FROM THEIR BOATS TO THE LITTLE CHURCH. THE{MOONFLEET MANOR {HOTEL}IT HAS A BAR CALLED THE{Y NOT BAR WHICH IS NAMED IN THE BOOK. THIS HOTEL IS A POPULAR PLACE TO STAY AS IT HAS LOTS OF THINGS TO DO. YOU CAN SWIM IN A POOL OR PLAY {TENNIS, SNOOKER}AND {SQUASH}OR USE THE{GYM}AND HAVE A{ {SAUNA. }
